about_the_game:
Once upon a time, a small town famous for its rich mining veins was abandoned due to a mysterious curse. People claimed that those who entered the mines never returned. Our hero, Aras, a brave miner, decides to descend into the mine, both to search for his lost family and to change the town's fate.

Aras's journey begins as he explores the old excavation sites, underground rivers, and ancient ruins of the mine. However, deep within the mine, an ancient and powerful entity, the Patron, has awakened. This being has created a labyrinth filled with powerful creatures and deadly traps to guard the mine's riches.

As Aras ventures deeper, he finds notes and tools left behind by the old miners. These clues reveal that to defeat the Patron, he must gather pieces of an ancient weapon. But each piece is protected by formidable enemies.

Eventually, Aras assembles the weapon and reaches the deepest level of the mine, where he must face the Patron in a final showdown. This battle will test not only his mining skills but also his strategy and courage. If he succeeds, he will break the curse and release the hidden treasures of the mine.

Gameplay Mechanics and Features

Movement and Exploration

  • Jumping and Leaping: The player can jump to overcome obstacles and reach higher platforms. Running jumps can be used to cross larger gaps.

  • Running: Running is essential for fast movement, dodging falling rocks, or being effective in timed areas.

  • Mining: Players can mine through the walls of the mine, uncovering hidden paths or valuable materials. The mining tool has a limited durability that can be improved as the player progresses.

Combat and Strategy

  • Attacking: Players can fight enemy creatures using various combat mechanics. The mining tool can be used as a weapon, and stronger equipment can be acquired as the player progresses.

  • Special Potion Usage:

    • Health Potion: Restores the player’s health.

    • Speed Potion: Temporarily increases the player’s movement speed.

    • Jump Potion: Increases the player's jumping power for higher areas.

Resource Gathering and Crafting

  • Material Collection: Players can extract materials like gold, crystals, and coal from the mine. They may also find rare items dropped by enemies.

  • Potion Crafting: Collected materials can be used to craft potions through a crafting menu. Different potions require unique combinations of materials.

Interaction and Environmental Dynamics

  • Traps: The player must avoid falling rocks, escape from campfire hazards, and navigate platforms that may collapse.

  • Puzzles: To reach certain areas, players must solve puzzles by strategically using their mining and jumping abilities.

  • Hidden Areas: Mining certain sections may reveal valuable treasures and hidden secrets.

Progression and Development

  • Equipment Upgrade: The player can use collected gold to upgrade their equipment.

  • Skill Development: As the player progresses, they can enhance abilities such as jump height, attack strength, health, and speed through upgrades.
